CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 6, 1962, pg. 21, reads: "Old Friends Meet - Despite the fact that he was very busy with preparations for the 1962 United Fund TV 'Spectacular' here, Pittsburgh's own wizard of the 88s, Erroll Garner (left), who appeared on the show, took time out to look up a friend of many years, Leroy Brown (right), sax ace. The two musicians indulged in some 'remember when' chit-chat.  Brown is recuperating from an illness which has sidelined him for a spell.  The meeting took place at an old stompin' ground, Crawford Grill, - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Jazz musicians Erroll Garner and Leroy Brown standing beside cigarette machine in Crawford Grill No. 2
